item.title: Customize Machine and On-demand Network Names
item.author: Autor
item.description: ~ Este post será traducido al español próximamente ~ vRA 8 blueprint gives random names and numbers to the VMs and on-demand NSX-T networks deployed if you do not specify a naming convention. This blog will cover how you can customize the names of your VMs and on-demand NSX-T networks when they are deployed from a vRA 8 blueprint. Demo Product Versions vSphere 6.5 U3 vRA 8.0.1 (including vRSLCM and vIDM) NSX-T 2.
